alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Moffat County through 700 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baggs, or 32 miles north of Craig, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Moffat County. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 120 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains
